question_text: What is the most likely reason a device has an IP address starting with 169.254?
answer_options: It is using a VPN connection
It was manually configured with a public IP
It failed to contact a DHCP server
It is part of a DMZ segment
correct_answer: It failed to contact a DHCP server
explanation: APIPA assigns a 169.254.x.x address when the DHCP server cannot be reached.
